name: Derek the Degu
description:
Derek the Degu is a 2D platformer where you play as Derek who just wants to play football and eat acorns. Stopping you from your objective is a lot of nasty plants and (for some reason) pitfalls to the core of the earth. Will our brave degu be able to reach his beloved football?

Made for the Global Game Jam 2023 

Art: 

Ida-Maja

Programming: 

Jenny

Jonathan

Love

Simon
